channel.title: ecological momentary assessment | Dr Olga Perski

item.title: Systematic review of Ecological Momentary Assessment (EMA) studies of five public health-related behaviours
item.description: I’m co-leading a large systematic review of ecological momentary assessment (EMA) studies targeting five public health-related behaviours, including smoking, alcohol, physical activity, dietary behaviours and sexual health-related behaviours. Findings from this review are expected to inform design decisions in future observational EMA studies.
